column4: Currently, the only installer we have is for Debian. The best way to install it is to add the line "deb http://actlab.tv/debian binary/" to your /etc/apt/sources.list file and then do an "apt-get update" and an "apt-get install snakebite". This will also install the latest version of BitTorrent (much more up-to-date than the standard one in Debian).
How to add that repo to my sources.list please
from a terminal: sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list -- add the line as specified somewhere in that file, then run those "apt-get" commands with sudo: "sudo apt-get update", etc
